metadata.description: Internet of rage is a skill-based Play-and-earn fighting game that captures the essence of arcade fighting classics like Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat, and Tekken 3 while delivering an in-game economy that rewards players with their combat prowess. The game will combine retro vibes and 3d kick-ass style, with beautiful 3D rendering and retro VFX.
metadata.name: InternetOfRage-Serum #1
